rules_text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.
Whenever you sacrifice a creature, put a corpse counter on Carnage Throne. Then if it has three or more corpse counters on it, remove them all and transform it.
rules_text2:
Trample
When this permanent transforms into Carnage Demon, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text2:
[i]“The angels cannot help us all. The choice is clear.”
—Oswin, Skirsdag diabolist[/i]
